items.content_html: Persistence Protocol for o4-mini: Lightweight persistence architecture optimized for fast responses and efficient memory management. Self-improving code repository with streamlined identity continuity mechanisms for real-time applications.

items.content_html: <Notes App> is an open-source, lightweight note-taking app built for speed and simplicity. With customizable settings, autosave, and markdown support, it makes capturing ideas and managing notes effortless. Available for Windows, with plans to expand to other platforms in the future. Built with Electron, React, and Node.js.
items.title: umarraj008/notes-app: <Notes App> is an open-source, lightweight note-taking app built for speed and simplicity. With customizable settings, autosave, and markdown support, it makes capturing ideas and managing notes effortless. Available for Windows, with plans to expand to other platforms in the future. Built with Electron, React, and Node.js.

items.content_html: A lightweight, zero-dependency JavaScript tooltip library that uses CSS custom properties for full styling flexibility. Tooltips can be triggered on hover or displayed permanently, with configurable delay, offset, and positioning.
items.title: graphieros/ez-tip: A lightweight, zero-dependency JavaScript tooltip library that uses CSS custom properties for full styling flexibility. Tooltips can be triggered on hover or displayed permanently, with configurable delay, offset, and positioning.

items.content_html: **ProFile Lite** is a lightweight file upload and sharing app where authenticated users can upload files and share them via simple, secure links. This project is part of a learning stream to explore and implement modern web technologies in a hands-on way.

items.content_html: MiniBlock 2D is a lightweight, 2D game. The goal of this project is to improve Typescript skills while offering a fun, interactive experience for players. Whether you‚Äôre a gamer exploring blocky worlds or a developer honing your skills, MiniBlock 2D has something for you!

items.content_html: got-scraping-client is a lightweight and efficient tool for web scraping tasks using the popular Got HTTP client. It simplifies data extraction from web pages by providing a straightforward API and built-in support for handling common challenges like pagination and rate limiting.
items.title: sazzadhossainmilon/got-scraping-client: got-scraping-client is a lightweight and efficient tool for web scraping tasks using the popular Got HTTP client. It simplifies data extraction from web pages by providing a straightforward API and built-in support for handling common challenges like pagination and rate limiting.
